 */const{replace}='';// escape
const es=/&(?:amp|#38|lt|#60|gt|#62|apos|#39|quot|#34);/g;const ca=/[&<>'"]/g;const esca={'&':'&','<':'<','>':'>',"'":''','"':'"'};const pe=m=>esca[m];const escape=es=>replace.call(es,ca,pe);exports.escape=escape;// unescape
const unes={'&':'&','&':'&','<':'<','<':'<','>':'>','>':'>',''':"'",''':"'",'"':'"','"':'"'};const cape=m=>unes[m];const unescape=un=>replace.call(un,es,cape);exports.unescape=unescape;
